2026-01-13PMOPublic Service Employment ActAppointment of a Senior Official, Privy Council OfficeAppointment of Michael Vandergrift of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Senior Official, Privy Council Office, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 19, 2026.N/A
